tags.name: Electronic Certificate Issuance Service
tags.description: Get information about Electronic Certificate Issuance

tags.name: NPWP Verification
tags.description: Get Information about individual or company NPWP

tags.name: Tax Number Verification
tags.description: Check the registered status of the associated NPWP based on NIK or NPWP.

post.description: This method helps you to perform identity checking through legal sources.

This method helps you to verify identity checking that shows legal subjects in order to issue an Electronic Certificate with the purpose of doing verification of citizenship data through legal sources. Please refer to [Verihubs Documentation](https://docs.verihubs.com/docs/electronic-certificate-issuance) for guidelines and best practice
This method helps you to check tax identifier. Please check [Verihubs Guidelines](https://docs.verihubs.com/docs/npwp-check) to learn more on how to use this endpoint.
This method helps you to check tax identifier. Please check Verihubs Guidelines to learn more on how to use this endpoint.
This method helps you to check tax identifier. Please check Verihubs Guidelines to learn more on how to use this endpoint.

nik.description: 16 digit numeric Identifier Number from ID.

birth_date.description: Date of birth from ID in DD-MM-YYYY format.

email.description: Email address (must be unique per nik).

phone.description: Valid phone number, use country code but without symbol (+), (must be unique per nik).

image.description: Selfie photo in base64 format, size min. 30 kB max. 2 MB, min pixel 400px x 400px.

nik.description: it will return "Registered or Not Registered". if Nik is not registered all the key; name, birthdate, birthplace, address will return null

name.description: it will return 'true' or 'false'based on individual name that registered on ektp.

birth_date.description: it will return 'true' or 'false'based on individual birth date that registered on ektp.

similarity.description: it will return a percentage of similarity '0-100'

message.example: Too many request in the allowed time frame

npwp.description: Personal tax number. Fill this field and left the NIK field empty if you want to hit with NPWP.

nik.description: Personal ID from KTP. Fill this field and left the NPWP field empty if you want to hit with NIK.

user_consent.description: User consent will be needed with NIK to ensure user's data.

npwp.description: tax identier of person or company

message.example: Too Many Request in allowed time frame

nik.description: Personal ID from KTP. Fill this field and left the NPWP field empty if you want to hit with NIK.

user_consent.description: User consent will be needed with NIK to ensure user's data.

npwp.description: tax identier of person or company

message.example: Too Many Request in allowed time frame

nik.description: Personal ID from KTP. Fill this field and left the NPWP field empty if you want to hit with NIK.

user_consent.description: User consent will be needed with NIK to ensure user's data.

nik.description: 16 digit numeric Identifier Number from ID.

birth_date.description: Date of birth from ID in DD-MM-YYYY format.

email.description: Email address (must be unique per nik).

phone.description: Valid phone number, use country code but without symbol (+), (must be unique per nik).

selfie_photo.description: Selfie photo in base64 format, size min. 100 kB max. 4 MB, min pixel 480px x 640px.

ktp_photo.description: KTP photo in base64 format, size min. 100 kB max. 2 MB, min pixel 480px x 360px.

channel.description: Brand's name (will be used in email).

reference_id.description: Use to indicate your company's transaction (must be unique).

id.description: Verihubs ID, generate string that are unique for every transactions

status.description: Identifier of the transactions. It will return verified, verified_with_reason, or not_verified

reject_field.description: Indicator if theres a "false" response to a or any parameter, example if nik detected as not found in data source, then the reject_filed will state [nik, name], and so on

field.description: shows payload that are having a problem or error

message.description: shows error description that happened to the payload
message.example: nik length should consist of 16 digit(s)
